m_szDocTitle: Genex Power Plans World's First Solar PV Plant & Pumped Hydro Storage Project
m_szDocSumamry: October 12th, 2015 by Giles Parkinson   Originally published on RenewEconomy . Genex Power has unveiled plans to build a 150MW solar PV project at the old Kidston gold mine in Queensland, siting it adjacent to a proposed 330MW pumped hydro storage project.
